cocktails.name: Margarita
cocktails.recipe: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a salt-rimmed glass.

cocktails.name: Mojito
cocktails.recipe: Muddle mint leaves with sugar and lime juice, then add rum and top with soda water.

cocktails.name: Old Fashioned
cocktails.recipe: Stir all ingredients with ice and garnish with an orange twist.

cocktails.name: Cosmopolitan
cocktails.recipe: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled glass.

cocktails.name: Whiskey Sour
cocktails.recipe: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into a glass. Optionally garnish with a cherry.

cocktails.name: Pina Colada
cocktails.recipe: Blend all ingredients with ice until smooth.

cocktails.name: Mai Tai
cocktails.recipe: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a glass filled with crushed ice.

cocktails.name: Negroni
cocktails.recipe: Stir ingredients with ice and strain into a glass with an orange slice.

cocktails.name: Daiquiri
cocktails.recipe: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled glass.

cocktails.name: Manhattan
cocktails.recipe: Stir ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled glass. Garnish with a cherry.
